text:
I just LOVE @@SpeakerPelosi!

Until she blocks me I’m gonna retweet her shit and preach about #Cannabis #Legislation. #CannabisHeals #Cancer, and is the best alternative to #alcoholism & #OpiodAddiction. Only #BigPharma and #corrupt #politicians benefit from its #prohibition. https://t.co/LLd0RaFUOW https://t.co/D0i3zAzao2
